name: RUNES / GRIEVED split 7 inch pink black haze LTD 300
description: Split 7" between two of the most interesting bands around lately. Grieved stay on the path paved with the previous effort "Samaritans" with two powerful songs that show the band at its finest: a sonic blast that expands what we can call the typical Grieved sound. A pleasure to make your ears bleed. Runes, on the contrary, seems that they've been forging their steel in the mud and filth, slowing down rhythms with a more abrasive songwriting, dragging down the listener into a rotten spiral. Two different ways to spread the sickness in one fine piece of vinyl. (Michael Simeon) Vinil wax : 200 multi color splatter / 300 pink black haze Artwork by Simone Deiana Tracklist : Runes side - Petrol City - Depersonalisation Grieved side: - Mirage - Forlese ANY ORDER OVER 50,00 € gets FREE SHIPPING. Please add the promotional code FREESHIPPING to the discount section while you check out.

name: CAPSIZE "Live A Burden, Die A Curse" 7 inch black
description: Hailing from San Diego, California, Capsize play a unique blend of modern hardcore with powerful drumming, killing riffage and suffering vocals on melodic lines. Departing from the previous album "Set Sail" sound, the californian five piece gives a more mature touch to the songwriting, that shows the band's potential at its finest. "Live A Burden, Die A Curse" is the band latest effort, three tracks of passionate and abrasive hardcore straight from/to the heart, ready to bring some freshness into the scene. Don't sleep on this while waiting for the full length. Track List : - Unwanted - Fade To Grey - Pleading Black vinyl is limited to 100 pieces ANY ORDER OVER 50,00 € gets FREE SHIPPING. Please add the promotional code FREESHIPPING to the discount section while you check out.

name: BREAK EVEN "the bright side" 12 LP
description: AA012 - BREAK EVEN "the bright side" 12 LP Since forming in the suburbs of Perth in 2005, Break Even have endured almost every experience a young band can; the highest of highs and the lowest of lows. The former includes putting out 2 successful releases and touring the country countless times with some of the biggest names in local and international hardcore. The latter on the other hand, includes undergoing numerous lineup changes and on a greater scale, a tragedy in the death of a band member. In November 2008 Break Even experienced the unthinkable, when their guitarist Rowan Willoughby took his own life. Rowans untimely death took a toll not only on the members of the band, but with everyone in the hardcore community, leaving a giant question mark over the future of the band. After some time the 4 remaining members returned to the rehearsal studio to see if they could go on with what they’d come to know as Break Even. Out of this process came their debut album, The Bright Side. Aptly named, it's a story of birth and death and everything in between. Recorded in March at Reading Room Studios in Perth, it is an honest and passionate statement that was written to remember, to inspire and to never forget. click here to listen to Break Even wax details : first press (SOLD OUT) -200 copies green/black splatter -300 copies blue/black a haze (a side b side) second press -200 transparent ultra clear -300 half and half transparent eletric blue solid baby blue splatter all the orders will be shipped in a proper vinyl box to protect them from any kind of postal damage !

half and half transparent eletric blue solid baby blue splatter

name: CREATIVE ADULT "Dead Air" 7 inch
description: Catalog n : AA024 Scott Philips' new project, along with members of All Teeth and Sirs, is set to explode. Despite his past hardcore (Life Long Tragedy) and hard rock (Purple Mercy) efforts, Creative Adult are more punk oriented, embracing elements of the early 80's californian punk along with new wave influences and a grungy touch. The result is "Dead Air", a 4 song smashing ep way far from all the commercial trends: it's rough, nervous, sick and full of dark vibes. Sickness has never felt this good. A perfect business card for the future and a great comeback. TRACLIST : 1. Dead Air (3:23) 2. Tabloid (3:24) 3. You (3:57) 4. Forbidden Fruit (2:14) wax color : grey limited to 300 pieces watch the official video for "Dead Air" here

name: DEAD SWANS  "Southern Blue"  7 inch
description: Dead Swans is a hardcore punk band from the south coast of UK, formed in the winter of ‘06. They have all been in or are in some bands you probably know (such as Nervous Wreck, Turn Cold and The Legacy), but this is something seperate, something new. Their album called Southern Blue was released by Anchors Aweigh last year as 7 inch version and got sold out in 4 months. We're now doing a second press with new inlay design and new vinyl colors. So Before their debut full length on bridge 9 records make sure you get this one or you'll regret forever. vynil color limited to 200 copies limited to 300 copies tracks list : – into dust – lines of separation – 20/07/07 – dead untill dark – the hanging sun swans drawing by www.sarahlu.com KKKK - KERRANG 8/10 ROCKSOUND 8/10 METAL HAMMER CLICK HERE to listen to lines of separation taken from Southern Blue. xo

name: GRIEVED "Samaritans" one sided 12 " gold silk printed wax LTD 50 pre order
description: Catalog : AA22 Format : One Sided 12″, Digital. Wax : 300 clear transparent – 150 black – 50 with gold silk print. Artwork by Eye Of Providence Design aka Fr3nk.com Tracklist : 1. Schemes 2. Samaritans 3. The Attrition of Reason 4. Stockholm Blues 5. They Dream 6. Pale Hands 7. Glistening 8. Notwithstanding This silk printed version with GOLD ink is super LIMITED to 50 pieces only, made by the amazing HEART STUDIO. Recorded, mixed and mastered by Lewis Johns at The Ranch Production House. While “Ageing” with their previous ep, Grieved has definitely aged with their new album “Samaritans“. Physically, but most of all musically. There’s still so much angst pumping in the veins of these 8 tracks, but the four swedish managed to create a more mature sound. The voice still pours emotionally driven anger, guitars develope distorted killer riffs and the rhythm section never sounded so sick, but somehow they created a more cerebral yet passionate songwriting. The result is “Samaritans”, 8 tracks of pure dark mid-tempo hardcore sickness in the vein of Cursed , well crafted, passionate and with a killer production. Grieved are ready to exit their obscure world and make a name for theirselves. - Michael Simeon ATTENTION : THIS IS A PRE-ORDER. IF YOU ORDER OTHER ITEMS ALONG WITH THIS ONE, YOUR ORDER WILL NOT SHIP UNTIL ALL ITEMS ARE IN STOCK. PLEASE PLACE A SEPARATE ORDER IF YOU WOULD LIKE YOUR NON PRE-ORDER ITEMS SHIPPED SOONER. This will start shipping June the 1th.

name: LIGHTHOUSE "abyssus abyssum invocat" lp
description: AA08 - LIGHTHOUSE "abyssus abyssum invocat" lp Ever since forming in late 2007, Lighthouse have recorded 2 Demos and an unreleased EP. Now with their debut Album "Abyssus Abyssum Invocat“ to be released on Anchors Aweigh Records this five piece is ready to spread their crushing & complex, yet melodic take on the genre. Recorded at "Die Tonmeisterei“ adding more complexity and sleeze to their previous material one is literally dragged through one hellhole to another to hit rock bottom. listen to XIII taken from "Abyssus Abyssum Invocat“ on our page then hit up Lighthouse on myspace for 2 more songs ! Album/tee artwork by Joshua Andrew Belanger (Defeater, Heaven Shall burn, The banner etc) tracklist: 1 Intro 2 Me & You 3 XIII 4 Coffind Dodger 5 Soul Survivor Pt. II 6 Blue Almost Black 7 Serpent's Tongue 8 Outro

name: MILES AWAY "Endless Roads" 12"  Lp
description: AA014 - MILES AWAY "Endless Roads" 12" Lp Perth’s Miles Away are set to confirm their standing at the top of the hardcore heap with their awe-inspiring third album, Endless Roads. The culmination of eight years of hard work, heartache and good times, Endless Roads is the sound of a passionate, road-hardened band at the height of their powers. Three years on from their previous effort, 2007’s Rewind Repeat, Miles Away are older, wiser and more determined than ever. Written last year during some rare downtime, Endless Roads was recorded in early 2010 at Wild Arctic studios in New York by producer Dean Baltulonis (Sick Of It All, American Nightmare). Having just completed a European Tour, this September / October the band will return to home soil for the Endless Roads Tour. TRACK LISTING 1. Hibernation 2. Seasonal 3. Ghostwriter 4. Separation Anxiety 5. Anywhere 6. Endless Roads 7. The Constant 8. Rain Eyes 9. Skeleton Key 10. Unsaid 11. Hearts and Minds Colors : 200 white multi color splatter 300 white blue a side b side haze

name: RUNES "s/t" 7  inch deluxe ltd
description: AA013 - RUNES "s/t" 7 inch Deluxe Edition with limited edition cover description: Runes is a new musical project made up of Dick Smith and Joseph Hayes from The Legacy and Andre Suergiu from Gold Kids. Five songs were recorded at Sleepwalkers Studio in Sardinia, Italy with Gabriele Boi in March 2010 and mastered by Cult of Luna’s Magnus Lindberg. The S/T 7” featuring artwork from Black Sails Design is due to be released in the summer on Anchors Aweigh Records and will feature the three songs: Age of Enlightenment, Human, all too Human and New Old Wounds.

name: TORTUGA "Kings of Abany" LP
description: AA05 - TORTUGA "Kings of Abany" 12" LP Tortuga (formed from the ashes of November Coming Fire) whilst only starting back in January 07 have already built up a reputation in the underground for being vicious, progressive, and unpredictable in their musical style. Not surprising, seeing as they take their influences from such bands as Breather Resist, Jesus Lizard, Botch, Refused, Breach & Black Sabbath. The new album Kings of Albany was Recorded and Mixed by Lol Eaves and Tortuga at Purple Studios between the months of March and July 2008. It was Mastered by Nick Zampiello at New Alliance East. Artwork by RUPE NELSON @ www.pikworld.i12.com tracklisting : > 1.The Lachrymose > 2.Dance Like No One's Watching > 3.Bury Me In You (fatal) > 4.Somethingness > 5.The Laudanum Boys Club > 6.Nothingness > 7.Winter’s Widow > 8.The Tomb Of John Wortley > 9.Hell's Red Roads > 10.Something Blue > 11.This Lonely Sailor CLICK HERE to listen to This Lonely Sailor

name: DAGGERS "Along the Acheron" cd
description: DAGGERS "Along the Acheron" cd The latest addition to the Anchors Aweigh Roster is DAGGERS. Hailing from Belgium, this four headed monster set out to leave nothing but ashes & dust. Their debut full-length "Along The Acheron" is a bastard of full speed aggression lurking in the gloom to prepare for the final blow. Recorded and mixed by Ben Phillips ( November Coming Fire, Bossk, Gold kids.. ) and mastered by Magnus Lindberg ( Cult Of Luna, In Flames ) Along The Acheron turned out to be also an uncompromising and pitch black piece of dark thoughts. It will tear down all false hope the world is feeding on. With their raw and pissed off sound they wrecked several stages all over Europe. With 2 years of existence Daggers is a relative young band, yet they know what they are aiming for. Each show more souls gather at these intense live performances and Daggers have already proven to be one of the most promising Belgian hardcore bands of the moment. tracks list : # 1 Animated Bones # 2 Dirty Minutes # 3 I Owe You Nothing # 4 Kv 77: << Ouverture >> # 5 Dragged Down # 6 Last Debt # 7 Mercenary Masses # 8 Charon's Path # 9 Introspection # 10 Ashes and Dust # 11 Kv 88: << Finale Dolor... # 12 Fuckin Filled # 13 Insel Der Toten listen to their new song on Myspace DIGITAL DOWNLOAD avaiblanle now on I TUNES
